components.name: LED (5mm)
components.summary: A semiconductor device that emits light when current flows through it. Requires current-limiting resistor.

components.name: Pushbutton
components.summary: A mechanical switch that connects two contacts when pressed. Has 4 pins with internal connections.

components.name: Resistor (220 ohm)
components.summary: A passive component that limits current flow. Non-polarized. Commonly used with LEDs.

components.name: Arduino UNO R3
components.summary: Popular microcontroller board with 14 digital I/O pins, 6 analog inputs, and USB connection.

components.name: Breadboard (Half-Size)
components.summary: Reusable platform for building circuits without soldering. Has power rails and terminal strips with internal connections.

components.name: Vibration Motor
components.summary: A small DC motor with eccentric mass that creates vibration. Used for haptic feedback. Requires transistor driver circuit.

components.name: Piezo Buzzer
components.summary: An electronic component that produces sound using piezoelectric effect. Active type has fixed tone, passive type supports variable frequencies with tone().
